Class Selection

java.lang.Object
minipaint.tools.Tool
minipaint.tools.Selection
All Implemented Interfaces:
LivePreview
public class Selection extends Tool implements LivePreview
A tool for drawing a dashed rectangular selection area.

This tool provides a live preview of the selection rectangle while the user is dragging the mouse. The final rectangle is drawn on the canvas when the mouse is released.

  • Field Summary
